text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: This is Ticket! Go straight for a while, then cyuuu diagonally left and after you're through the byooo part you should see the plane!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Teio here! I have no clue what you're saying, get me some directions. Over!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Here it is… the wings are wrecked but the power unit looks 
essentially intact. I think we can make great use of that.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …… Taishin, can you help?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Mm, I just need to take it apart into chunks that fit 
on the truck, right? I'll fix any small issues while at it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Whoa…… Amazing…… 
…………

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(Even the welding angles have been considered in detail. 
These marks are from constant readjustments… As Hayahide 
said, you can feel just how much work went into this…)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: (But even so… they couldn't succeed……)

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
How's it, Taishin!? 
See anything useful as a mechanical engineer?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Umm… hmm? There's something here 
not on the researcher's plane… This the part 
she said lead it to crash maybe? But—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
This can't be it… if anything, it's what let it fly this far. 
And the improvements to be made are actually really obvious.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Really!? What a relieeeeeff! 
That should take a load off her shoulders too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(I hated failing… I didn't want to lose. 
I thought it only showed my own weakness.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: (But……)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Everything has been loaded up. 
It's on you now, chauffeur Teio!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wah— Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa……! Oh jeez!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It would seem the heavy load is quite troubling. 
… I forgot a truck like this drives very differently.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: —But we can't well give up, can we?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
We won't lose! Won't give up!! 
And we're flying that plane!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Prodigal Driver Teio's on the scene!! 
Her driving skills will make short work of tow trucks!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
We worked our asses off to get this thing running. I'm not 
letting anything break up this chain of dreams and wishes!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And I can't let Double Turbo take all the credit!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Twin Turbo!! ―Ah, she got it half right……!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hold on everyone, we're blasting off!
…………—yyy………—aaaiit…………

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
…… Hmm? Was that a voice? 
………Ahh!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: This is Ticket! A car's approaching Teio! I think they're trying to say something!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Car……? Oh, it's true! They're coming at us real fast.
Waaaiit uuuup! Give it baaaack! Plane thiieeeves!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: P-plane thieves!? Pull over for a minute!

―I see. You people work for the owner of this craft, yes? 
Ok, I understand.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad we cleared up that thief misunderstanding. 
And you are? What do you want with us… no, this plane?

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Studying metals is my calling. I've been coming here to 
research this abandoned craft, and I'd appreciate if you 
didn't take away my research subject!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It's ours though?

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Well yes, it would seem that way. 
So hand it over please!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We cannot do that. As you can see, we are 
recovering this aircraft. The technology it holds 
must be incorporated into a new model.

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Oho, now that's great news! You see, I've been 
so very impressed looking at this engine!

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text:
To try and make a box of metal fly, oh the madness! 
But this craft holds the potential to make it reality!

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Wouldn't it fly if you changed the material of the fuselage…? 
With the iron-based alloy I came up with!!

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text:
That's been on my mind, you see. 
I want a plane to fly by using my alloy!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You found a dream upon seeing this plane too!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
She's just like her!! They're connected through this plane! 
Ooooh the dramaaa! Owwooooohh!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … The old mentor's plane drew in this researcher……

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(Without going through the failures… and coming to retrieve 
them now… we would've never met this researcher.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(Hayahide said failures are part of a history…… 
Is this what she meant?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(… I'm here because of what I've gone through as well. 
If I'd won all my races easily…)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: (… Things could be very different now.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ……… Hey?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Would you…… mind maybe…… lending us a hand?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
We have… another researcher for you to meet. 
Come with us.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin……!

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text:
―Ohoho, you were a step ahead of me, huh. 
But a joint research project is music to my ears!
